articles.title: Healthy Eating
articles.description: A balanced diet helps maintain your overall health and energy levels.
ways_to_achieve: Drink at least 8 glasses of water
Reduce sugar and junk food intake

articles.title: Regular Exercise
articles.description: Exercise helps improve your physical and mental well-being.
ways_to_achieve: Do at least 30 minutes of physical activity daily
Try activities like walking, jogging, yoga, or sports
Take breaks from long sitting periods
